ratings.en: Begin the Secret Operation! Head for the New Yamato!
The Silent Invasion! Ginga, Take Up Your Arms!
Shocking! The Dezarium's Dark Millennium of History
Fire the Starting Gun! The New Battleship Yamato Comes To Life
Fierce Clash! Destroy the Invisible Battleship!
The Terrible Orfevre Zone! Yamato, Bet It All on a Surprise Attack!
Activate the Space Battleship Arizona! Reveal the true nature of the Dezarium!
Friendship torn apart! Yamato, break through the subspace gate at all costs!
The Fierce Attack of the Deusura-III! The Terrible Operation Asteroid!
Enter the Dark Gas Clouds! Chase the Witch of Uralia!
